Roller skates with built-in speakers that allow users to listen to music directly from their phone or tablet.
Roller skates with adjustable speed controls that allow users to adjust the speed of the skates according to their skill level.
Roller skates with LED lights that light up the skates as the user moves, creating a unique and eye-catching display.
Roller skates with a built-in GPS tracker that allows users to track their skating progress and compete with friends.
